abstract: The Cain campaign faces a new test with a report that the candidate was the target of complaints by women about inappropriate behavior.
snippet: The Cain campaign faces a new test with a report that the candidate was the target of complaints by women about inappropriate behavior.
lead_paragraph: 9:07 p.m. | Updated Two women who worked with Herman Cain at the National Restaurant Association in the 1990s complained of sexually suggestive behavior by him and later took financial payments before leaving the organization, according to a report by Politico on Sunday night.

headline.main: Report Cites Women's Claims of Inappropriate Acts by Cain
